data.title: Wonderful find for true art lovers.
data.text: We discovered this small gallery & artists' collective some months ago. With each visit, we're more and more impressed with the caliber of the artwork. The downstairs gallery contains innovative, beautiful & unique works with frequently changing exhibits. We see now they opened a small coffee house on the first floor as well.Upstairs are working artists galleries The gallery is located in a nicely renovated old building in an area which hopefully will become an important mecca for the arts.  It's exciting to watch this happen.

data.title: First Class Gallery and Working Artists Facility
data.text: This is the best place ever for the public to be able to engage with working artists of all generes in a shared environment.  This beautifully restored building used to be an historic hotel and it has been restored and re-purposed as a fabulous free-to-the-pubic gallery downstairs and artists lofts upstairs. But the best thing for tourists (and locals) is that for a small fee you can join in events throughout the week like a lyrics lab for poets, songwriters, (and general public wannabees); painting workshops, music workshops -- there's no end to the options for public interaction.

data.title: Eclectic Venue
data.text: BCA features art, music, spoken word .. lots of interesting events and modern facility. Pompano is developing the arts
